Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Restore production and rebuild homes" (恢复生产 重建家园), the poster shows planning for rebuilding housing stock (overseen by a senior PLA official), and workers at work.
